data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 v1803 Firefox Nightly v63.0a1
data.expected_result: The "spectate" and "ask to join" buttons are centered.
data.short_description: [Website Bug] The "spectate" and "ask to join" buttons in the Rich Presence Visualizer are off-centered
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Developer Portal - Go to Applications - Click on an existing application or create a new one - Go to Rich Presence - View the Rich Presence Visualizer
